dmca.title: Company Wants Google to Remove Competitors
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support,
DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

1). Identification of product being infringed
The copyrighted work at issue is the Multi-DNC product itself & the product logo. The Multi-DNC product is a software program that we created & resell from our website. Memex is not an authorized reseller of our product.

2). Google search query
Search Query:	Multi-DNC 

Infringing Web Pages:

The website located at www.memex.ca & www.multi-dnc.ca contains numerous references to our product Multi-DNC including screen shots. Memex is reselling our Multi-DNC product without authorization to do so. I have included a copy of a letter from our attorney that clearly states the facts regarding Memex & [private].

We are also contacting the ISP responsible for the www.memex.ca domain & we will be asking them to revoke Memex's ability to use the domain.

The website located at www.e-manufacturing.com also contains numerous references to our product Multi-DNC including screen shots. This website is also owned & operated by [private] (Memex). Specifically here are a couple of pages that are displayed in Google.
www.e-manufacturing.com/2001pr/2001-07.htm
www.e-manufacturing.com/2001pr/2001-19.htm

3). Our contact information
Spectrum CNC Technologies
[private]	
Corona, CA 92880	
Website	www.multi-dnc.com & www.xpertdnc.com	
Mr. [private]	[private]@[private].com	
Telephone	(xxx) xxx-xxxx	

4). Infringing party contact information	Tel: xxx.xxx.xxxx
Memex Electronics Inc.	
Address:	
[private]	Fax: xxx-xxx-xxxx
Hamilton, Ontario	Sales: Extension xxx
Canada L8L 4J5	Web: www.memex.ca
E-Mail: [private]@[private]	

5). Belief statement
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6). Sworn statement
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signed, Mr. [private] - Owner / Partner Spectrum CNC Technologies.
7/14/04
